00028     public function indexAction()
00029     {
00030         if ($this->_requests->hasGet()) {
00031             $id = $this->_requests->gets()->id;
00032             $this->getView()->pid = $id;
00033             $this->getView()->picData = $this->_getModel()->getImageInfo($id);
00034             $this->getView()->tags = $this->_getModel()->getImageTags($id);
00035         }
00036     }

00044     public function fileAction()
00045     {
00046         if ($this->_requests->hasGet()) {
00047 
00048             $id = $this->_requests->gets()->id;
00049             $size = $this->_requests->gets()->size;
00050 
00051             if ($this->_getModel()->checkPermission($id)) {
00052                 $this->getView()->type = 'jpeg';
00053                 $this->getView()->fileData = Galleria_Image::getData($id, $size);
00054                 $this->getView()->filesize = Galleria_Image::getFilesize($id, $size);
00055             } elseif (!($this->_getModel()->fileFound($id) && Galleria_Image::fileFound($id))) {
00056                 $this->getView()->type = 'png';
00057                 $this->getView()->fileData = Galleria_Image::fileNotFound($size);
00058             } else {
00059                 $this->getView()->type = 'png';
00060                 $this->getView()->fileData = Galleria_Image::permissionDenied($size);
00061             }
00062 
00063         } else {
00064             $this->getView()->type = 'png';
00065             $this->getView()->fileData = Galleria_Image::fileNotFound();
00066         }
00067         $this->getView()->setRenderLayout(false); // Disable layout rendering
00068     }
00069 
00070 }
